title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

1 point is earned for the integrand
1 point is earned for the limits and constant
1 point is earned for the answer

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 3 points:
1 point is earned for identification of θ = 3.425618 as a candidate
1 point is earned for the correct answer
1 point is earned for justification

r ′ (θ)=cosθ−θsinθ=0⇒θ=0.860334, 3.425618 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5AD8@

Therefore, the greatest distance from any point on the graph of r to the origin is 3.288.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 3 points:

1 point is earned for d y d x = d y / d θ d x / d θ
1 point is earned for the equation
1 point is earned for the answer

d y d x = d y / d θ d x / d θ

At the point where the tangent line has slope 2 2 − π , 2 2 − π = 1 / 2 d x / d θ

Therefore, dx dθ = 1 2 ⋅ 2−π 2 = 2−π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48CC@ at this point.
